column4: Can someone help me with this problem? New Link http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=3562587

I boot into the Ubuntu Install CD and choose the first install and the screen flashes and the monitor looses signal. It sits there forever, the computer doesn't turn off and the drive doesn't stop spinning. I tried it in safe graphics mode and it does the same thing. Version 7.04 normal does the same thing.
I thhink ubuntu stop sending signal to my monitor. I have a fuller version here http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=580108
do the same thing again, change to vesa driver
I did and it did nothing
you should look at xorg.log to see what is happening
Ok, how do I go about doing that? And do you think using 7.10 Alternate CD would work?
In recovery mode or when it loses signal?
normally when you boot normal bootup
Ok, that will bring me to a command line and it will give me graphics?
I just asked if it works or now
if you can get to command line at all
Ok, gimme a sec, I'm downloading the 7.10 Alt. If I do get to command line what should I type to get the log?
Ok, gimme a sec, I'm downloading the 7.10 Alt. If I do get to command line what should I type to get the log?
I tried but Control-Alt-F1 didn't get me to the command line
I tried but Control-Alt-F1 didn't get me to the command line
